mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board() VALUES( #{userIdx}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, 0, NOW(), NULL )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET user_idx=#{userIdx}, board_title=#{boardTitle}, board_content=#{boardContent}, update_time=NOW() WHERE board_idx=#{boardIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT , count(a.board_idx) as cnt_board_answer FROM (board b LEFT JOIN user u on b.user_idx=u.user_idx) LEFT JOIN answer a on b.board_idx=a.board_idx LEFT JOIN fond f on b.board_idx=f.board_idx GROUP BY b.board_idx Order By b.date DESC LIMIT #{pageInfo.firstIndex}, #{recordsPerPage}

SELECT , count(a.board_idx) as cnt_board_answer FROM (board b LEFT JOIN user u on b.user_idx=u.user_idx) LEFT JOIN answer a on b.board_idx=a.board_idx LEFT JOIN fond f on b.board_idx=f.board_idx GROUP BY b.board_idx Order By b.board_view DESC LIMIT #{pageInfo.firstIndex}, #{recordsPerPage}

SELECT , count(a.board_idx) as cnt_board_answer FROM (board b LEFT JOIN user u on b.user_idx=u.user_idx) LEFT JOIN answer a on b.board_idx=a.board_idx LEFT JOIN fond f on b.board_idx=f.board_idx GROUP BY b.board_idx HAVING cnt_board_answer=0 Order By b.date DESC LIMIT #{pageInfo.firstIndex}, #{recordsPerPage}
SELECT SUM(a.answer_is_adopted) as answer_is_adopted FROM board b LEFT JOIN answer a on b.board_idx=a.board_idx WHERE b.board_idx=#{boardIdx} and a.answer_is_adopted is not null
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_view=board_view+1 WHERE board_idx=#{boardIdx}
